attributes.action: Make November 5th a National Public Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK has fewer public holidays than most other Western countries. We all also like to celebrate Bonfire Night on November 5th with fireworks - it's a date every kid looks forward to, like 4th of July in America, so why not make it a public holiday in the long stretch between August Bank Holiday and Christmas?
